name: Maze-TwoColoursTwoButtons
description:
This game was developed at RMIT during 2016.2. We, Amanda Chagas and Rafael Lobo, worked together through the weeks on the course Game Design Studio 4 where we had to present one game a week. Maze was developed on Week09 under the theme: Two Colours Two Buttons.

This is a single-player game where the objective is to complete the five different mazes over the game. The player needs to use a controller with analog sticks to play the game. So, the player rotates the maze using the directions on the left stick.
